attributes.action: If Scotland is independent, the whole Tibet, East Turkestan, Inner Mongolia, Canton, etc. must also be independent!
attributes.additional_details:
If Scotland is independent, the whole Tibet, East Turkestan, Inner Mongolia, Canton, etc. must also be independent!

Although the Britain is now a highly developed country with high democracy and human rights, there is still a China here which is still extremely totalitarian. China's rise in the 21st Century may cause threats to the whole world, including the Britain. Britain must not be split so that it remains powerful and will be capable of solving the threats of China in the 21st Century.

What the UK Government should do:
Never let Scotland be independent. Arouse Scottish patriotism with the Great British Empire and her history of military and socioeconomic strengths.
